bestBHT.bht: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain, from the top to the bottom. This significant event occurred when Jesus breathed His last breath on the cross. The tearing of the veil symbolizes the opening of access to God's presence for all believers. The earthquake and the splitting of rocks and opened graves further emphasize the extraordinary nature of this momentous occasion. This event is also described in the Gospel of Matthew, reaffirming its importance in demonstrating the transformative power of Jesus' sacrifice.

John Gill: And the vail of the temple was rent in twain, from the top to the bottom.
At which time also there was an earthquake, and the rocks were rent, and graves were opened.

And the veil of the temple was rent in twain, from the top to the bottom. This significant event occurred when Jesus breathed His last breath on the cross. The veil being torn symbolizes the access to God's presence that is now available to all believers. The earthquake, the splitting rocks, and the opened graves further emphasize the extraordinary nature of this moment. Matthew also confirms this event, highlighting its profound significance in demonstrating the transformative power of Jesus' sacrifice.

After Jesus breathed His last breath on the cross, the veil of the temple was rent in twain, from the top to the bottom. This tearing of the veil opened a way for all believers to access God's presence. The earthquake, splitting rocks, and the opening of graves further emphasize the remarkable nature of this event. Matthew's account also confirms this incident, underscoring the profound significance of Jesus' sacrifice and its transformative power for humanity.

And the veil of the temple was rent in twain, from the top to the bottom. This momentous event occurred at the exact moment when Jesus gave up His Spirit on the cross. The tearing of the veil signifies the opening of access to God's presence for all believers. The accompanying earthquake, splitting rocks, and opened graves serve as a powerful testament to the extraordinary nature of this event. Matthew's account also confirms the significance of Jesus' sacrifice and showcases its transformative power for humanity.
